chapter.title: Before You Install
chapter.para: This chapter covers requirements for running ${projectName} software.

tip.para: If you have a special request to support a component or combination not listed here, contact ForgeRock at info@forgerock.com.

section.title: JDK Version
section.para: This release of ${projectName} requires Java Development Kit 6, 7, or 8. ForgeRock recommends the most recent update to ensure you have the latest security fixes.
If you install an OpenAM policy agent in the same container as ${projectName}, then you must use a Java release that is supported with the policy agent as well.
